Getting Started with SQuADDS¶

Installation¶

SQuADDS can be installed using pip.

pip install SQuADDS

Alternatively, you can install SQuADDS from source.

  1. Clone Repository: Navigate to your chosen directory and clone the repository.

    cd <REPO-PATH>
git clone https://github.com/shanto268/SQuADDS

  2. Install Dependencies: Activate your Qiskit Metal conda environment and install dependencies.

    conda activate <YOUR-ENV>
cd SQuADDS
pip install .
